contract_delivery_date = #{contractDeliveryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sal_reviewer = #{salReviewer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, required_cost_of_project = #{requiredCostOfProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, required_completion_date = #{requiredCompletionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, about_department = #{aboutDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, develop = #{develop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrange = #{arrange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, special_material = #{specialMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eng_reviewer = #{engReviewer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eng_reviewer_date = #{engReviewerDate,jdbcType=DATE}, pur_period = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT r.id id, r.quotation_no quotationNo, r.info_record_number infoRecordNumber, r.create_time createTime, r.project_leader projectLeader, r.special_material specialMaterial, r.is_attached isAttached, r.sal_preparer salPreparer, IF(p.END_TIME_,CONCAT('审核完成'),CONCAT('审核中')) processInstanceId, r.pro_expected_start_time proExpectedStartTime, r.pro_expected_shortest_completion_time proExpectedShortestCompletionTime, r.pro_expected_longest_completion_time proExpectedLongestCompletionTime, r.state state, c.work_card_no workCardNo FROM sal_reviewer r LEFT JOIN sal_work_card c ON r.id = c.sal_reviewer_id LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst p ON r.process_instance_id = p.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN act_ru_task t ON t.PROC_INST_ID_ = r.process_instance_id AND t.ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee} AND r.quotation_no LIKE '%${quotationNo}%-%' AND r.quotation_no LIKE '%-${quotationYear}%' AND r.project_leader LIKE '%${projectLeader}%' AND r.create_time >= #{startCreateTime} AND r.create_time <= #{endCreateTime} AND r.is_cost = #{isCost} ORDER BY RIGHT(workCardNo,2) ${order},LEFT(workCardNo,6) ${order} ORDER BY RIGHT(quotationNo,2) ${order},LEFT(quotationNo,6) ${order} ORDER BY #{sort} ${order} ORDER BY RIGHT(quotationNo,2) DESC,LEFT(quotationNo,6) DESC LIMIT #{startPage},#{rows}
